userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials from Washington & Lee University's Special Collections are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study, pursuant to U.S. Copyright law. The user assumes full responsibility for any use of the materials, including but not limited to, infringement of copyright and publication rights of reproduced materials. Any materials used should be fully credited with the source. Permission for publication of this material, in part or in full, must be secured with the Head of Special Collections.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Washington and Lee Law Student Notebook, WLU Coll. 0133, Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA
In some cases the citation format may vary. Please contact Special Collections' staff to verify the appropriate format.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a former Washington and Lee Unversity law student's class notes. The identity of the student is unknown.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research use.
